name: Enable Chatbot
description: A popup chatbot that can read the current URL and upload an image.

content_security_policy.extension_pages: script-src 'self'; object-src 'self'; img-src 'self' https: data:; connect-src 'self' http://localhost:* http://127.0.0.1:* http://192.168.*:* http://10.*:* http://172.16.*:* https://* data:;
